The Center of Gravity is a point at which the aircraft would balance if it were suspended at that point. Gravity or weight acts through this point.

**Aft CG** – higher cruise speed, lower stall speed, less stable, adverse stall recovery  
**Forward CG** – lower cruise speed, higher stall speed, longer take off roll

(Pilot's Handbook of Aeronautical Knowledge 10-2)
